#summary A set of functions for CameraControlSystem fixed camera.

=== Overview ===
A fixed cameras position and orientation never change. 
<BR>
<BR>
<BR>
=== !SetFixedCameraPosition(double camera_mode_ptr, double x, double y, double z) ===
----
Sets the position of the camera.
====Parameters====
   * _camera_id_ - The ID of the camera control system camera object.
   * _x_, _y_, _z_ - The position of the camera.
<BR>
<BR>
=== !SetFixedCameraOrientation(double camera_mode_ptr, double yaw, double pitch, double roll) ===
----
Sets the orientation of the camera.
====Parameters====
   * _camera_id_ - The ID of the camera control system camera object.
   * _yaw_, _pitch_, _roll_ - The euler angles to orient the camera around.
<BR>
<BR>
